reviews.review_msg: Took both American Politics and American Foreign Policy with Moens. Can honestly say the hardest I had to work in my undergraduate degree, I mean that in a good way. Won't massage your academic ego with low work load. Stimulating discussion with a professor who, while right-leaning, grades based on your ability to defend an argument.

You could tell that the whole class really respected Mike, and it's easy to see why. He is so knowledgeable and leads really interesting discussions. Assignments weren't too bad. Just two papers and a presentation. Participation is key to getting a good mark as he values your input.
